name: RougeBots: The Ultimate Dumb
description:
BEST PLAYED WITH A MOUSE

Game made for WOWIE game jam

Keep the bots from falling to their DOOM!

use your mouse to drag the bots to safety

This is a very cool game

Get my mobile game: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.MOOOKSGames.ShootShot
